title.rendered: HOLIDAY GIFTS + THE GREEN TREND IS HOT!

content.rendered:
HOLIDAY GIFTS + THE GREEN TREND IS HOT!

Happy Holidays from D’Lashes! It’s almost 2020 and what an exciting time for new year and new goals. I really wish you so much happiness, health, and success in this new decade. It’s such an exciting time!

I’m still loving this beautiful green trend especially for holiday dresses, bags, and even jeans. This trend is also perfect for after the new year moving towards Spring. Finishing off a look with accessories I’m obsessed with LUVAJ.com earring. LUV AJ has great price points and the earring are very hypoallergenic.

Both green dresses are from FWRD.COM. Check them out for all your fashion forward style needs. For a perfect useful gift, I love giving AESOP luxury hand soaps and lotions that run about $39-$50. And you can’t go wrong with giving Prada perfume for both men and women. A lot of the original Prada bottles are very unisex and come in the most classy iconic beautiful bottles. Finishing off with a beautiful green bag from Mansur Gavriel.

P.S. Did you book your lash extensions appointment yet? Book those lash extensions appointments early during the busy holiday season! For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

HAPPY NEW YEAR 2020!

XO XO, Dionne Phillips
